subject: Hockey, Ice
Language and Languages
lead_paragraph: For Blackhawks left wing Artemi Panarin, a Russian, the language of hockey takes over at the rink, and he has responded by becoming one of the top first-year players in the N.H.L.
snippet: For Blackhawks left wing Artemi Panarin, a Russian, the language of hockey takes over at the rink, and he has responded by becoming one of the top first-year players in the N.H.L.
